name: ai_chart_assessor-api
description: Next.js API endpoint for chart risk assessment using Gemini.

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:flutter && npm run copy:static
scripts.build:flutter: git clone -b 3.16.0 https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git /tmp/flutter && /tmp/flutter/bin/flutter precache && /tmp/flutter/bin/flutter build web --web-renderer html --base-href /
scripts.copy:static: mkdir -p out && cp -r build/web/* out/ && cp -r .next/server/pages/api/* out/api/
